item.description:
Margaritas and Mexican Food in Northampton

It's time to travel North of the Border for Mexican food!

First, we will meet at Mama Iguanas at 7PM for Margaritas.
http://www.fundining....

Mama Iguanas is the trendy Mexican place in town that supposedly has great Margaritas.
There we'll imbibe on Mexican elixirs, and the 57 varieties of Tequila.
No silly, you don't have to try them all!

Then at 8:30 precisely (or as precise as you can get after 57 different types of Tequila), we'll take a 2 minute stroll for the cheap, authentic Mexican food at La Veracruzana.
http://www.laveracruz...

After that, if more is desired, Spoleto also has great Margaritas (they use lime juice, freshly squeezed for each drink), and yummy desserts.

This evening coincides with Northampton's Arts Night Out, so arrive early, if you want to check out a few galleries.

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: Margaritas and Mexican Food in Northampton
